title: JAPANESE DUBS FOR LEAGUE CONFIRMED!

embed.description: サモナーの皆様、まもなく始まる「リーグ・オブ・レジェンド」モニタリングテストに先駆け、日本版チャンピオンの声を一部先行で公開！　また、声を担当して頂いた声優さん4名のインタビューも収録。

body:
Just yesterday the Japanese servers got confirmed along with official dubs in Jap for each character. The video has some of the voice actor names. Most of them seem really good so far with a few stand-out's like Annie and Master Yi.

I wonder if we'll get a Japanese Anime skin when the servers go live? Anyways just posting this here to keep you guys informed, you might even want to consider switching the sound files for the Jap ones if you like them better.

replies.body: And I bet you all they're going to get a free server skin.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Amt5Z3L1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-20T07:36:11.121+0000)
>
> And I bet you all they're going to get a free server skin.

"Too bad you kids are stuck with me!" - {{item:3070}} {{champion:38}} {{item:3070}}
No odds would make me bet against you XD
